column2: "Hm? Who are you? If you're not a Dragonkin, then I have no business with you."
"Is my name Aki? You're pretty bold to ask for someone's identity so directly."
"Yes, I am Professor Aki. And just who might you be? I have no memory of you, and my memory is perfect."
"Wait, I can tell by your expression. You were sent here by Light. Am I correct?"
"If the purpose of your quest was to find me, then he's the only one who would have requested that."
"Let me guess, he was whining about \"if anything should happen to her\"?"
"I guess I don't have a choice. Since you found me, I'll go ahead and head back."
"And sorry, but would you mind telling me your name?"
"You may prove to be a lot more interesting than the Dragonkin."
"I was talking to myself, pay me no mind."
"<%me>, I'll remember you. See you around."
